#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
unsigned long long int a[1100],N,K;
int main()
{
//    freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
    int i,j,k,l;
    while(scanf("%llu %llu",&N,&K)!=EOF)
    {
        for(i=0;i<N;i++)scanf("%llu",&a[i]);
        for(i=0,k=0;i<N-1&&k==0;i++)
        {
            for(j=i+1;j<N&&k==0;j++)
            {
                if(a[i]+a[j]==K)k=1;
            }
        }
        if(k==0)printf("No\n");
        else printf("Yes\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
